name: Country Life Survival RPG ~making ends meet~
name_original: Country Life Survival RPG ~making ends meet~
description:
Naoko Enjoji was raised in a home of wealth and luxury. Suddenly, she was uprooted by a condition for her schooling:
"The mistress will experience life in my hometown."
So began Naoko's life of survival in the countryside.

Train fare was 15800 yen.
If Naoko wanted to go home, she had to scrape together the money.
Explore the mountains, towns and village!
Collect garbage, fish the rivers!
